author: chfast
content: Can you make sure the name is consistent? "Blob gas price" (4844) vs "blob base fee" (7516).

author: smartprogrammer
content:
referencing https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7516
the opcode value `0x49` is already used for `BLOBHASH` opcode in 4844

author: timbeiko
content:
**Call Recap**
- A few additions to Dencun:
    - **EIP-7514**: Max Epoch Churn Limit, agreed to include and set the limit to 8, only on the deposit queue
    - **EIP-7516**: `BLOBBASEFEE`, agreed to include and use `0x4a` opcode
    - **EIP-4788**: agreed to merge the changes from the audits so far (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7672), and we'll discuss the issues around touching system addresses in Monday's call. 
- All of the above will be included in devnet-9, we'll try and have implementations done + tested by ACDC next week, and set a launch date for the devnet then.
- We got a really nice overview of Reth - see above ðŸ˜„
